website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option that has passed safety tests but does not "fit" every child.
pros: Little need for bothersome strap re-threading
cons: Fits some cars better than others, and narrow seat fits some children better than others

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous after reading some reviews saying they got a seat manufactured several years ago. Luckily that was not the case with mine (mine was manufactured late 2016). I liked the bright red of this to match the interior of my jeep. Loads of plastic will make it easier to wipe clean than my son's horrid high back booster (seriously, kids are gross and too much fabric makes it harder to get super clean). The padding isn't thick, but my son says it's comfortable. "Like sitting on a cloud," is what he actually said, but he's nearing 7 and awfully dramatic.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, reasonably narrow booster with cushy seat
customer_reviews.text: Vibrantly colored. Nice and sturdy booster. My skinny (50lb), tall (48”) six year old son approved the comfort level of the seat and was happy it came in non-traditional color (bright red). It being just over 15” wide, fits in middle back seat to give the option of 3-across.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: Simple and straight forward. It's a booster seat and it does what it says it does. My son finds it comfortable and likes that the "fast" red color gives us added speed when racing around town doing things such as food shopping, lol. All in all seat is good quality and works as expected. I would recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Great for Uber/Taxi etc.
customer_reviews.text: We use this seat when we take Uber. It goes in and out of all the different cars very easily and the seat belt position-er is great since every car is a bit different. I can very easily ensure the shoulder belt is running correctly across my son's chest. It is very lightweight, has a handle on the bottom to carry and is small enough to not be obtrusive. My son has never complained about being uncomfortable and loves his "red racecar seat."
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Purchase for a 100lb+ kid. This is only weight ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchase for a 100lb+ kid. This is only weight rated to 100#. Contacted the manufacturer who sent another, which was supposed weight rated to 110 lbs, but it was also rated to 100 lbs. If you need this for a kid who's over 100 lbs, it may not work
customer_reviews.author: Barlf

customer_reviews.title: Great booster
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for my daughter and I love the elastic cup holders. They prevent my daughter from filling them with trash and random junk.
customer_reviews.author: CAmom

customer_reviews.title: This seat is super easy to carry with us as an extra booster ...
customer_reviews.text: This seat is super easy to carry with us as an extra booster for my daughter's friends who we may need to take along for a ride. It is light weight, not too wide so other car seats can sit comfortably next to it, and the kids love the bright red. The added cup holder straps are a nice touch. I wish it had a tether to secure it to the car anchors though
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for car with two other car seata
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 5 year old when his sister was born. It is awesome because it still allows him to have two cup holders without the bulk on the sides so we can fit our other two car seats!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cheap to buy, quick and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Super light weight and easy to toss in and go. But that same light weight makes me wish it had a latch system or some rubber underneath to hold it more firmly in place under my child. Also, some better padding would have been thoughtful. All in all, it's a low price seat with low price features that gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, armrests high but booster itself quite wide for a car seat spot
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is indeed a booster, make my son go higher and the armrests are high that makes it easier for him to wrap the seatbelt around and buckle it. And it is lightweight. The only thing though is, i think it is quite big (wide) and having a bit of struggle to fit it decently in 1 seat spot (space) in a car (i got a civic 4 door). Maybe for vans or suvs will be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: MMendi000

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good and reasonably priced booster seat. My six year old grandson loves it. It is simple and comfortable. The elastic cup holders are great, too (for reference, I usually use bottled water). My other booster seat was much more expensive and has pull out cup-holders. They are awkward and take up much more room. I highly recommend this seat!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight booster
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well made, cover comes off for washing. Easy for my son to buckle self, fits 3 across in larger Subaru. Does not latch. Cup holders always in out position. Overall great buy - have one in each car!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to install with the seat belt. I just hope it's safe. I definitely don't want to test it to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: grandmaGigi

customer_reviews.title: Big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Great booster seat. Both my boys have one & they are very well built and the red is a bonus!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as pictured. Nice coloring, lightweight, 2 cup holders, the material for the seat kinda slides around quite a bit. I think it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Torie

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware of this item was defective
customer_reviews.text: This booster was such a disappointment it was defective it didn’t come with a shoulder strap Insert area! I am very very disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: sony

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it!....Very comfortable for my 6 year-old grandson, and doesn't take up much space. Also love the fact that the cup holder is elastic and so fits any size drink container without the 'stick out' !
customer_reviews.author: MOUNTAIN LADY

customer_reviews.title: It ok.
customer_reviews.text: Big, bulky, the seatbelt clasp was not well made or toddler safe.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Spear

customer_reviews.title: Description information wrong, but still a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Listing claims to be for 22-120 lbs, box says 40-100... So just be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Brittany

customer_reviews.title: but I wish it came with instructions of how to ...
customer_reviews.text: but I wish it came with instructions of how to place the belt, etc. It just came in the box with no information. August 17, 2014 OH! NO stupid! me.......My 6 year grandson just showed me that the instructions are right on the seat!!!!!! DUH! Clear written instructions with diagrams on both sides of the car seat. I love it!!!!!! and so does he.
customer_reviews.author: Planaria J. Price

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Kiddo loves it and durable. Cup holders don't stick out and the entire thing wipes up easy since it's more of a vinyl than fabric
customer_reviews.author: jennah

customer_reviews.title: My grandson LOVES it.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and that it's lightweight but yes durable.
customer_reviews.author: Msdiva55

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and well made and attractive. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and attractive. Comfortable seat and waterproof. Easy to store in trunk when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He says it’s very comfortable. I like the elastic cup holder, it allows you to fit many different sized bottles.
customer_reviews.author: InVinoVeritas

customer_reviews.title: slim fit backless booster like I wanted
customer_reviews.text: for great between two car seats which is what I needed! love the color too.
customer_reviews.author: katelyn pyle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a slick booster. Easy to clean. The kids loved the cup holder straps on the sides. My smallest guy seemed to have trouble getting comfortable. The base depth seems to be for kids with longer legs.
customer_reviews.author: Cow Town Girl

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this booster. Makes him feel like a "big boy". It fits well in the backseat of my car and ive had no complaints regarding comfort. I also bought the padding for the seatbelt so ha cnlan lay his head comfortably if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Snow

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and simple to use. Bottom pad is a little bit thin.
customer_reviews.author: Evergreen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 5-year-old daughter for use in my husband's Dodge Ram Rebel. It matches the interior fairly well and my daughter loves it. She really likes the cup holders. She uses them for toys, drinks, etc and they hold things well. It's super light and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Evenflo Amp Performance No Back Booster seat
customer_reviews.text: The Evenflo Amp Performance No Back Booster seat is great. I love it. Thanks, JoyH
customer_reviews.author: JoyH

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Safe, comfortable (although obviously not padded like a regular car seat) and good looking. Also, the elastic cup holders are brilliant. The flexibility allows for all kinds of cups and bottles, and on long trips, fries. We now own two of these and love both.
customer_reviews.author: R Talwar

customer_reviews.title: Sooo easy!
customer_reviews.text: I am a working mom and there are a variety of people that help out making sure my kid gets picked up from preschool when I can't. That means a variety of cars he might be in. These are so light weight it is easy switch from car to car and they are very washable.
customer_reviews.author: onthego

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat is the best. Love the color and retro look. Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: Myshelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, super easy to use, handy cup holder. Great for extra seat to send with son visiting grandparents or friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Prefect for my great-nieces. Light and easy to take and go
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great seat, fits well in the back (third row) seat of our Mazda5.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D.

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: This seat sits well in the car and fits my 5 year old daughter comfortably. It is easy for her to manage the seat belt across it, and she is in love with the cup holders. It looks nice and is holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: jsol

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat for my son
customer_reviews.text: Great booster seat for my son. His previous model with the high back was given to my 4 year old daughter and we bought this as his replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction and ease of installation. Very easy to use for my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son, 72 pound son seems to really like this seat. He says it's comfortable and he loves the two cup holders. I love that it's lightweight and easy to move around but still seems to be good quality. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: we love the design and my kids said it is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Glossy luxury finish, we love the design and my kids said it is very comfortable to sit on. But we found the belt clip as useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great car seat for the money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this booster seat. The seat is soft, so long car rides are not painful. she especially loves the cup holder on the side to keep her drinks close by without spilling.
customer_reviews.author: Campfirerex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install..comfortable..very happy with this seat for my 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of them for my twin grandsons. Well made
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Francis

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and durability that this booster seat has. Very pleased. Would definitely recommend to anyone whose child or grandchild can graduate from their car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Lindak

customer_reviews.title: Booster Seat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chair at a great price. Its light so we can move it easily between cars.
customer_reviews.author: COMPU10

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and safe for kids 40 lbs and 40" talle
customer_reviews.text: The kids that I take to school all fit well in this booster. Amazed at how a lightweight booster can be so safe but it's rated well.
customer_reviews.author: Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent - we own three of them!
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat gets the IT JUST WORKS award! It's light, sturdy, simple to use, and our two boys (5 & 7) think they're perfectly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Shipman

customer_reviews.title: Great Booster
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our grandchildren when they come to visit. It's sturdy and comfortable and a pretty bright red color which the boys enjoy. I love the little side indents that can hold a sippy cup for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Rose M. Letourneau

customer_reviews.title: Comfty for our lil guy
customer_reviews.text: The car seat fits pretty snug on the window side. I cannot always buckle it on the first try since seat touches buckle. I have a Jeep Liberty so space is limited... not too roomy in the back. It fits just right in my husbands Suburban.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Valdez Horne

customer_reviews.title: Seat is not very secure
customer_reviews.text: Car seat was not very secure. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NewRoc Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect booster. Perfect price. The booster sits higher then most on the market causing the seatbelt to sit perfectly around young children without the fear of the seatbelt choking them. My kids think the design is retro and looks like a race car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jescy

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great booster seat that seems to be comfortable for my son. I love that it has two cup holders as well since he often has drinks in the car. I highly reccommend this seat for a boy or girl.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hartmann

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: The seat are durable and easy to clean. I absolutely love the cup holders! To boot, the price was amazingly fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Donna H.

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good seat. The strap for the seatbelt is pointless when you can't figure it out. I don't drive so it's only used when I'm out with friends.
customer_reviews.author: N.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice booster seat. Fits very well in the back seat of my car. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Toliver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great when the little guys are ready to move out of the child (baby) seats.
customer_reviews.author: jerry sergent

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Son
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and attractive. It's the one my son picked out and he seems to be happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: was bigger than I expected but functions great.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves the racing red, was bigger than I expected but functions great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Booster!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for my boys (7 and 5) and they fit perfect in the Suburban. They are a bit wide which is what most complain about if they do not have a bench seat. The padding looked thin in the pictures but is surprisingly soft and no complaints from the kids.
customer_reviews.author: thudson331

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, decent price, what else is there to say. Easy 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna F

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but wide
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this five stars b/c my son finds the seat very comfortable. He just turned 5 and the week after we got this, we went on a 4 hour road trip in a rented car. He fell asleep. The only possible negative I would point out is that it's fairly wide. With my daughter's carseat on the one side and my son's on the other, I was the only adult passenger able to fit in the middle seat between them so I am not sure that this would work for families who need to use three carseats going across.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: No bulk with this product, just an easy cleanable, lightweight, safe seat!
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Mclendon

customer_reviews.title: Safe easy carseat
customer_reviews.text: Chose this booster car seat for my 5 year old and it works great. I have a smaller car and it really fits snug and is easy for him to get in and out of. Cupholders work well too.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Mom

customer_reviews.title: Boosters made easy
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, easy to clean, and the kids seem to have not problem wanting to use the booster. With more than 5 colors to pick from, it is not hard to find one that the child will like.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Benson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we need
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we need. Some padding in the seat vs some of the others I've seen out there.
customer_reviews.author: Readingmommy

customer_reviews.title: Love it and love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love it and love the color! Also, like the straps as opposed to the standard cup holders which don't always fit larger or taller drinks without toppling over.
customer_reviews.author: BUFFY N. MARSHALL

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE, GOOD PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: NOW THAT THE LAWS HAVE CHANGED AND AGE AND WEIGHT RESTRICTIONS, I ENDED UP BUYING THIS SEAT FOR MY 6 YEAR OLD--WHO WENT A COUPLE OF YEARS WEARING JUST HER SEATBELT. I LIKE THE COLOR, THE CUP-HOLDER, AND THE DURABILITY OF THIS SEAT. ITS ALSO REALLY EASY FOR MY DAUGHTER TO GET INTO IT AND ATTACH HERSELF.
customer_reviews.author: W. Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe my little boy is big enough for a backless booster! I did SO much research on the right seat for us. I couldn't be happier with this seat! My boy loves it, he says its comfortable, and loved the cup holders. I love the color, sturdiness, the ease of moving it from one car to another.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Evenflo Amp carseat
customer_reviews.text: took a minute to figure out the best placement, but my rider is comfortable with good adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this because of the safety rating. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of the safety rating. It is somewhat uncomfortable for the child, but safety matters. It comes with a safety strap but the directions are not very clear, so we can't use the strap. I would purchase it again because it is cleanable and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: MawChris

customer_reviews.title: Great booster!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Great height, and lightweight. My kids love sitting on it. Perfect price!
customer_reviews.author: akida goppy

customer_reviews.title: Was delighted with the look and it is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Was delighted with the look and it is easy to use. I believe it is very comfortable for my grandchild to sit in even on longer trips.
customer_reviews.author: s boyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat
customer_reviews.text: This isn't really all that different from any other 'no back booster' seat I've seen. My son likes the cup holders. I got this as a back up seat for his pre-k field trips.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Modern look and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and the ease of use. Good step when getting your child from the full restraining car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Kubis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, easy use, cupholder is low...but we're not using it anyway. Booster doesn't take much room in truck, too.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Chodur

customer_reviews.title: Great car booster!
customer_reviews.text: Great car booster. My daughter says it's very comfortable and I like the expandable cup holders on the side!
customer_reviews.author: AL_KO

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: The kids picked their own colors and love their new car seats. Used them for the first time on a 16 hour road trip to Disney World and they worked perfectly for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: My 4 yr old son loves this
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our 4 year old son. His other car seat was stained and too hard to get clean. This seat is mostly plastic so it doesn't stain and the fabric is easy to remove and machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: It is light and comfortable. my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the seat for my 5 yr old. The seat arrived very fast. It is light and comfortable. my daughter loves it! Th seat is fairly wide and fits perfectly in the 2nd row seat of honda odyssey.
customer_reviews.author: D Williams

product_meta.title: Evenflo Amp Performance No Back Booster Car Seat, Red
product_meta.description:
The Amp Performance Booster is cool and comfortable. The cool colors will allow your child to express their individuality while parents know they are safe. The contoured padding is a comfortable option for long journeys. Appropriate for children 4 years and older. Protecting children is our core mission at Evenflo. For almost a century we have been a leader in safety, innovation and education. Knowing that one in four automobile accidents are side impact collisions, we believe it's important to go beyond the current government standards when designing the next generation of Evenflo car seats, including the Amp Performance. Designed and tested for structural integrity at energy levels approximately 2X the federal crash test standard comfy. Comfortable, contoured padding, great for long journeys. Amp Seats come in a variety of colors. Always accessible elastic dual cup holders for drinks easy cleaning. Pad removes for machine washing. DO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permitted. Plastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. Do not use abrasive cleaners or solvents. Take care not to damage any labels. The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry. Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat. Periodically inspect and clean the restraint's crotch buckle of food, liquids, and other debris to ensure proper latching. Place the buckle in a cup of warm water and gently agitate the buckle back and forth. Press the red button several times while the buckle is in the water. Do not submerge the harness strap. To avoid damage to the buckle, do not clean the buckle with soap or detergents and do not use a lubricant. NO BACK BOOSTER. Weight: 40 - 110 lbs. (18 - 49.8 kg.). Height: 40 - 57 in. (102 - 145 cm.). e- t least four years of age. it-Top of child's ears are at or below the top of the vehicle seat headrest.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Amp Performance Booster is cool and comfortable. The cool colors will allow your child to express their individuality while parents know they are safe. The contoured padding is a comfortable option for long journeys. Appropriate for children 3 years and older. Protecting children is our core mission at Evenflo. For almost a century we have been a leader in safety, innovation and education. Knowing that one in four automobile accidents are side impact collisions, we believe it's important to go beyond the current government standards when designing the next generation of Evenflo car seats, including the Amp Performance. Designed and tested for structural integrity at energy levels approximately 2X the federal crash test standard comfy. Comfortable, contoured padding, great for long journeys. Amp Seats come in a variety of colors. Always accessible elastic dual cup holders for drinks easy cleaning. Pad removes for machine washing. DO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permitted. Plastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. Do not use abrasive cleaners or solvents. Take care not to damage any labels. The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry. Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat. Periodically inspect and clean the restraint's crotch buckle of food, liquids, and other debris to ensure proper latching. Place the buckle in a cup of warm water and gently agitate the buckle back and forth. Press the red button several times while the buckle is in the water. Do not submerge the harness strap. To avoid damage to the buckle, do not clean the buckle with soap or detergents and do not use a lubricant. NO BACK BOOSTER. Weight: 40 - 110 lbs. (18 - 49.8 kg.). Height: 40 - 57 in. (102 - 145 cm.). e- t least four years of age. it-Top of child's ears are at or below the top of the vehicle seat headrest.
feature_bullets: Designed and tested for structural integrity at energy levels approximately 2X the federal crash test standard, Comfy, comfortable, contoured padding, great for long journeys, Convenient, always accessible elastic dual cup holders for drinks, Easy cleaning, pad removes for machine washing
The weight range for the product recommended is 22 pounds to 120 pounds

specifications.Care instructions: DO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permitted Plastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. Do not use abrasive cleaners or solvents. Take care not to damage any labels. The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry. Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars143 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
